languages.text: "Ренегаты готовы на что угодно, лишь бы убить проклятое Дитя. Убить меня. Я не желаю, чтобы предатели саботировали перелет сквозь Море Душ, навсегда похоронив нас средь ужасов варпа. Это обезглавит обе наши династии, вы так не думаете?"

traits.locale_text: "Ренегаты готовы на что угодно, лишь бы убить проклятое Дитя. Убить меня. Я не желаю, чтобы предатели саботировали перелет сквозь Море Душ, навсегда похоронив нас средь ужасов варпа. Это обезглавит обе наши династии, вы так не думаете?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. To kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties leaderless, wouldn't you agree?"
languages.original_text: "Ренегаты готовы на что угодно, лишь бы убить проклятое Дитя. Убить меня. Я не желаю, чтобы предатели саботировали перелет сквозь Море Душ, навсегда похоронив нас средь ужасов варпа. Это обезглавит обе наши династии, вы так не думаете?"

traits.locale_text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. Kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties beheaded, wouldn't you agree?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. Kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties beheaded, wouldn't you agree?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. Kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties beheaded, wouldn't you agree?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. Kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties beheaded, wouldn't you agree?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. To kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties leaderless, wouldn't you agree?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. To kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties leaderless, wouldn't you agree?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「反逆派は呪いの巫女、つまりあたくしを殺すためなら手段をいとわないでしょう。魂の海を渡る航海を妨げる裏切り者はいりません、そうなれば歪みの恐怖の真ん中で永遠に埋葬されることになりますから。我ら両家のトップが不在になることになりますが、よろしいのですか？」
languages.original_text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. To kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties leaderless, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.locale_text: 「反逆派は呪いの巫女、つまりあたくしを殺すためなら手段をいとわないでしょう。魂の海を渡る航海を妨げる裏切り者はいりません、そうなれば歪みの恐怖の真ん中で永遠に埋葬されることになりますから。我ら両家のトップが不在になることになりますが、よろしいのですか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “那些叛徒会不惜一切代价杀死被诅咒的孩子，不惜一切代价杀了我。我不想让那些叛徒破坏我们穿越灵魂之海的旅程，让我们所有人永远葬身在亚空间的恐怖之中。那样的话，我们两个王朝都会变得群龙无首，你说呢？”
languages.original_text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. To kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties leaderless, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.locale_text: “那些叛徒会不惜一切代价杀死被诅咒的孩子，不惜一切代价杀了我。我不想让那些叛徒破坏我们穿越灵魂之海的旅程，让我们所有人永远葬身在亚空间的恐怖之中。那样的话，我们两个王朝都会变得群龙无首，你说呢？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Les renégats tenteront tout ce qui est en leur pouvoir pour tuer l'enfant maudit. Autrement dit, me tuer moi. Je refuse que des traîtres viennent saboter notre voyage dans la Mer des Âmes et nous fassent errer à jamais dans les horreurs du Warp. Car alors, nos deux dynasties se retrouveraient sans chef, n'êtes-vous pas d'accord ? »
languages.original_text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. To kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties leaderless, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.locale_text: « Les renégats tenteront tout ce qui est en leur pouvoir pour tuer l'enfant maudit. Tuez-moi. Je refuse que des traîtres viennent saboter notre voyage dans la Mer des Âmes et nous fassent errer à jamais dans les horreurs du Warp. Car alors, nos deux dynasties se retrouveraient sans chef, n'êtes-vous pas d'accord ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Los renegados harán cualquier cosa para matar a la niña maldita. A mí. No quiero que unos traidores saboteen nuestra travesía por el Mar de Almas y nos condenen a un periplo eterno entre los horrores de la disformidad. Eso descabezaría nuestras dos dinastías, ¿no cree?».
languages.original_text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. To kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties leaderless, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.locale_text: «Los renegados harán cualquier cosa para matar a la niña maldita. A mí. No quiero que unos traidores saboteen nuestra travesía por el mar de almas y nos condenen a un periplo eterno entre los horrores de la disformidad. Eso descabezaría nuestras dos dinastías, ¿no cree?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Abtrünnigen werden alles tun, um das verfluchte Kind zu töten. Um mich zu töten. Ich will nicht, dass Verräter unsere Reise durch das Meer der Seelen sabotieren und uns für immer inmitten der Schrecken des Warps begraben. Das würde unser beider Dynastien führungslos zurücklassen, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. To kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties leaderless, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Abtrünnigen werden alles tun, um das verfluchte Kind zu töten. Um mich zu töten. Ich will nicht, dass Verräter unsere Reise durch das Meer der Seelen sabotieren und uns für immer inmitten der Schrecken des Warps begraben. Das würde unser beider Dynastien köpfen, nicht wahr?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hainler; lanetli Çocuk'u, yani beni öldürmek için her şeyi göze almış durumda. Ruhlar Denizi'ndeki seyahatimizi baltalayıp bizi ebediyen öteboyutun dehşetine gömmelerini istemiyorum. Öyle bir durumda ikimizin de hanedanlıkları lidersiz kalır, yanlış mıyım?"
languages.original_text: "The renegades will do anything to kill the cursed Child. To kill me. I do not want traitors to sabotage our voyage across the Sea of Souls and forever bury us amid the horrors of the warp. That would leave both our dynasties leaderless, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.locale_text: "Hainler; lanetli Çocuk'u, yani beni öldürmek için her şeyi göze almış durumda. Ruhlar Denizi'ndeki seyahatimizi baltalayıp bizi ebediyen öteboyutun dehşetine gömmelerini istemiyorum. Öyle bir durumda ikimizin de hanedanlıkları lidersiz kalır, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
